name: light-that-burns-the-sky
effect: Inflicts damage using either Attack or Special Attack stat, whichever is higher. Determining which stat is used takes into account stat changes but not held items or abilities.
short_effect: Inflicts damage using either Attack or Special Attack stat, whichever is higher.

flavor_text.sword_shield: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.
